channel.title: Hugo on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on blog

item.title: Hugo basics
item.description: Create a new site in a directory <site_name> hugo new site <site_name> Running the server locally (-D flag is to render pages marked as drafts) hugo server -D Github This repo has the alternate stream set to ‘development’. So pushing master to here will not effect the site itself. Deploying ./deploy.sh This script deploys the website to the repo georgesims21.github.io as a proper site. It will not render files marked as drafts, so it should look exactly the same as locally if you run:
